# scalingo_database (Resource)

Resource representing a Database NG on Scalingo

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "scalingo_database" "test_postgres" {
  name       = "my-postgres-db"
  technology = "postgresql-ng"
  plan       = "postgresql-ng-enterprise-4096"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Database NG
- `plan` (String) Name of the plan of the Database NG to provision
- `technology` (String) Technology of the Database NG

### Optional

- `project_id` (String) ID of the project to which the Database NG belongs to

### Read-Only

- `app_id` (String) ID of the application automatically created with the Database NG
- `database_id` (String) ID of the Database NG on DBAPI side
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `plan_id` (String) ID of the plan of the Database NG to provision
